name: VtuResults
0:
”Alexa, open results teller”
”Alexa, ask results teller to tell gpa for semester 4 batch 16 of series 177”
”Alexa, ask results teller to say gpa for batch 16 semester 4 having series 177”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: results teller
des:
Vtu Results, shows VTU(Visvesvaraya Technological University) semester results provided USN(Unique Student Number) and SEMESTER. To make the conversation easy, user needs to just say their batch year, semester and series of Unique Student Number(USN). Right now this skill shows results only for Bangalore Institute of Technology(BIT).
Available batches are 15,16 and 17 and their semester are 6, 4 and 2 respectively. In other words, batch 16 students belong to semester 4 only and so on. Users can vary their USN(Unique Student Number) after having correct combination of their batch and semester.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
